document_data.name: Yantra
document_data.mainbody: '''Yantra''' was an inhabitant of the [[Dalelands]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She took comments on cooking personally.
document_data.Relationships: She thought highly of her husband, [[Pardus]].
document_data.History: Yantra and her husband were patrons at the [[Highmoon Inn]] in {{yearlink|1357}} while [[Shandril Shessair]] was away, after [[Mirtul]] but before [[Flamerule]]. She had a brief argument with other patrons and ordered roasted boar for her man, though he wanted roasted deer.
